name: Spaceship Rescue
description:
created for a Ludum Dare  game jam (72hrs) 

Guide both spaceships (yellow) through the obstacles (asteroid belt) aim for the green pathways

• SPACEBAR (shoot fire burst) *gauge fills up as you pass more obstacles

• Shields are applied automatically and are good for 1 crash

• Slowmo's (slows the rate at which the obstacles are spawned) *gives you a momentary breather

<IF PLAYING BROWSER VERSION - GO FULL SCREEN FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE>

GOOD LUCK!
